To start, while posting the log is generally helpful, a few words of prose defining the problem (along with a more meaningful title) will go a long way toward you getting help.

The source of the NPE appears to be the org.jboss.ide.eclipse.core.ProjectChangeListener.resourceChanged() method, which is being invoked in response to a change in some file/folder/project in the workspace. Unfortunately, this is not Eclipse code, so it's pretty much impossible for anybody on the platform team to help you.

You're more likely to get a response if you take this bug to JBoss.

There does seem to a another problem that may have something to do with JDT, but I'll guess that it is an indirect effect of the same problem you're having with JBoss (since the original problem has something to do with resources changing and may be screwing up the Java Model).
